data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 3,659 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Semnan, Iran
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Semnan to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 3,659 believers in Semnan to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Semnan, Iran to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 698,741 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Semnan.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Semnan who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Semnan, Iran has a population of 702,400.

We estimate Semnan has 3,659 people who might know Jesus, 9,485 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 689,256 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, guide the 3,659 believers in Semnan to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
